Welcome to the Tower of the Sorcer, brave soul. Your task is to rescue the Princess from the hands of the Demon Zeno. Try to use the stairs on the upper left conner on this floor to go upstairs. Different floors will have different obstacles and items. To get though monsters, you have to fight them. To unlock doors, you need to spend a key of the same color. Have fun exploring. If you like this game, please talk to me again.

I am an international student from Boston University, and I am graduating in May 2018. I am currently looking for software developing jobs which can provide me sponsorship. My resume can be found in my GitHub repository \'https://github.com/MrIceCreamMan/Tower_of_the_Sorcerer\', and my email address is \'catching@bu.edu\'. Thank you very much for helping me with job search.
. . . \t\t. . . \t\tup. . . \t\twake up. . .
I got caught when I was looking for a treasure in this tower. You are so lucky because I have just finished digging the tunnel. Follow me and let\'s get out!

Your weapons were taken away. I know there is one iron sword on the 5th floor, and one iron shield on the 9th floor. You should avoid fight before you get weapons. By the way, I have dug many tunnels in this tower. If you are able to find them, they will help you a lot. Good luck.
Thank you so much for killing the Skeleton Captain so I can go upstairs. I heard there is a silver sword on 17th floor. Good luck.
Did the giant octopus block your way? Don\'t worry, I have just finished this tunnel. I gotta go upstairs and look for my treasure. Enjoy this free tunnel.
Sigh, I am out of luck. I can\'t find my treasure anywhere. I need to get some rest.

Thank you so much for saving me! I got caught again, but this time, they took my mattock away so I can\'t get out myself. I have hidden my other mattocks in the tower and now I will look for them. Is the Dragon on the 35th floor blocking your way? To pay you back. I will dig a tunnel for you so you can get around the Dragon.
Give me some time, I must find my hidden mattocks first. I will catch you up on the 35th floor.

Just follow the tunnel and you will go upstairs. After this incident, I realized that it\'s not worth risking my life looking for some treasures which may not even exist. I\'m outta here. Good luck and goodbye.
What? Thief!? Why are you here? Didn\'t you leave?
Haha! Pretty surprised seeing me huh? The only reason I am here is that I am Zeno!
But why? Why would you help when you could easily kill me?

Because of power. I want more power!!! The Archmage is only slightly stronger than me, but he became the owner of this tower while I was assigned to be the region boss on the 50th floor. When I found him became obsessed with his spell book, I knew my chance was coming. Before he locked himself up in his chamber trying to create the strongest spell, I managed to replace the last page of his book so he would never succeed. Later, I started to kill his minions and he did know because he has not gone out of his chamber yet. Now he is dead and I will rule this tower!
If I can kill him, what makes you think I won\'t kill you?

You were able to kill him because he tried to use magic against you. He didn\'t know that the sacred weapons you are wielding resist magics. According to the last page of the spell book: \'both the Sacred Sword and the Sacred Shield were born in the lava. They were purified by the holy fire so they resist magic.\' I tried to steal these weapons myself but I almost died to the lava protecting the Sacred Shield, so I decided to let others to steal them for me, and that\'s why I didn't kill then. Though my magic power is not the greatest, I combat power is much stronger than the Archmage. Hand over your weapons or you will die!
Thank you so much for saving me. I can increase your attack and defense power by 3 percent. Do you want me to do it now?
I am too old to fight. Brave young man, you should take this Staff of Wisdom, which reveals the strength of monsters. Take care and good luck.
There are doors which cannot be opened with a key. To open them, you will have to defeat the monsters which guard them.
After you make a purchase from a merchant, go talk to him again because he will tell you some important information.
I heard that there are two hidden red keys hidden in this area.

Thank god, you saved me! The slime-man blocked the exit. Take this bottle of Elixir as a symbol of my gratitude. It recovers your health based on your attack and defense power. The stronger you are, the more health you will recover.
Many knights had failed to pass this area because of those Rock Monsters. Their defenses are very high, so you should increase your offense at the altar a few time in this area.
Do you know the Archmage in this area is the owner of this tower? He is way too strong for you now. Fighting him is suicide. You should go to higher floors and get stronger first.
It is said that there is a hidden message in this floor.
\'Go 0F\' Go to the 0th floor!
At this current stage, if you have 1500 health, 80 attack, 98 defense, 5 yellow keys and 1 blue key, you are in an ideal state.
The attack power of the swordsmen is too high. You should only fight them when you can one shot them, or you will lose a lot of health.
When monsters charge to you, they will attack first!
If you find the four secret tunnels in this floor, you will be able to go upstairs without fighting strong enemies.
This floor is an item warehouse, but to get the treasure, you will have to use the enhanced mattock.
At three o\'clock, the secret treasure which allows you to teleport three times will appear.
Mages can attack from a distance with their magic. Passing through a pair of Demon Sergeants will cut your health in half.
The 44th floor is in a different dimension, and you can\'t get there with stairs, but you may try to teleport.
There is a secret about the 41st floor - it is perfectly symmetrical even though it doesn't seem to be.
The shape of five on a dice is actually an ancient symbol for sealing magic. Remember the symbol because it will help you in the future.
Good luck young man!
Thank you so much for freeing me. Please take this 1000 gold as a gift.
I have a blue key for 50 gold. Would you like to buy it?
I have 5 yellow keys for 50 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I have a red key for 800 gold. Would you like to buy it?
I have lots of yellow keys, 1000 gold each. Would you like to buy one?
I have a blue key for 200 gold. Would you like to buy it?
Would you like to sell your yellow keys to me for 100 gold each. I need lots of them.
I have 1 blue key and 4 yellow keys for 1000 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I have 3 yellow keys for 200 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I have 3 blue keys for 2000 gold. Would you like to buy them?
I can recover you 2000 health for 1000 gold. Would you let me do it?
I have a enhanced mattock for 4000 gold. Would you like to buy it?
Thank you. Good luck on your journey
This tower consists of 50 floors. Every 10 floors form one area, and each area has one boss guarding the entrance to the next area. To proceed, you must defeat these bosses.
When you offer gold in exchange for strength at an alter, prioritize defense can save you a lot of health in the following fights, but it isn\'t always the best option.
Have you found the secret tunnels on the 9th, 16th, and 18th floor? I heard that there are more of them on higher floors.
When you carry a cross, your attacks will be twice as effective against zombies and the Vampire. There is a cross hidden on a floor higher than this one.
Even though the tower is said to have 50 floors, I have never heard anyone reaching to the 50th floor.
There is never a gate without Gate-Keepers, and there must be a gate when you see Gate-Keepers.
There is a Lucky Gold hidden in this tower. If you carry it with you, the money you get from battles will be doubled.
I heard that the Sacred Shield can protect you against all kinds of magic attacks. But I also heard that this shield is hidden on a floor which doesn't exist.
I heard that to kill the Dragon, you must have the Dragonsbane, which doubles your attack against the Dragon.
Keep it secret, and don\'t tell others

Another interloper! Sergeants, throw him in jail!
You are trapped!!! Soldiers, go kill him!!!
Oh nice, fresh blood! You never thought those Giant Bats were just my disguise, did you? This is how I hunt: lure the prey in, and drain their blood. mmmwwwahahahaha. . .
Haha, young man, you did a great job coming this far. If you are not afraid of death, you should go through the portal on th 24th floor I just opened. I will be waiting for you on the other side.
What? This is Zeno\'s voice. How is he not dead? And the princess is only a doll?!
. . . tear of slime, fang of bat. . . What! An intruder!!! Did you just kill all my minions?!!! I WILL SHOW YOU WHO IS THE BOSS HERE!!!
What? An interloper! It\'s been a long time since the last man make it through the Vampire. It doesn\'t matter anymore because I will kill you right here right now!
You think you are pretty strong, huh? That\'s because I didn\'t use my full strength. If you can make it to the 40th floor, I shall then fight you with my full power.
You think I am that easily defeated? You must be kidding me! What you just killed were merely illusions. Now, it\'s my turn to kill you!
You can never defeat me! Skeleton Elites, charge!
Charge! Knight squad! Go kill him!
You will not stand a chance against my Swordsman Squad. CHARGE FORWARD!!!
He is weak now! Knight Elites, charge!!!
You angered me so much! You should really turn away and run because I am going to kill you myself!
Don\'t you dare following me! I\'m going to call some backups, and you are doomed
Oh! Lord Zeno! I. . . I am. . . I am not able to defeat this man. P. . . Ple. . . Please forgive me.
You are far too weak. You are no longer of any use. Sergeants, kill him!
No. Please, Lord Zeno. Please. Aaahhh!!!

You are quite strong, young man. You can make a very good subordinate of mine. I can let you be the boss on the 40th to replace the fool I just killed. I will give you some time to think it through. You will give me your answer when we meet on the 49th floor.
You are not here to surrender yourself to me? And you want to kill me? You just made a terrible decision, and I will make sure you pay for it. Sergeants, on guard!
What? You created the symbol sealing away my magic power? You still won\'t defeat me though I only get 1/10 of my power.
